sub_title: Dutch Language Teacher and Trainer. Helping busy professionals get out of their English bubble and actually start speaking Dutch. info@betterdutch.nl
summary:
I am a very experienced, driven and enthusiastic Dutch language trainer, dedicated to helping you improve your Dutch as quickly as possible and, most importantly, help you have the courage to speak Dutch.  
Typically people come to me because at some point they did attend a Dutch language course, but they never actually put their knowledge of Dutch into practice. Whether it's because people always reply in English when they do try, or whether they lack the confidence – it has been a huge hurdle to overcome. They have never been able to get into a routine of speaking Dutch, and so they stay in their international bubble of English-speakers, sometimes for years on end. Sound familiar?

That's why I have created my lessons to help busy professionals get into the flow of speaking Dutch with confidence – whether it is at work with colleagues, with their children's teachers and playmates or with their Dutch neighbours. 

Why work with me > My tutoring style is personal and easygoing with a good pinch of humour. Believe it or not, you can learn Dutch and have a good laugh while you are at it. I strongly believe learning a language should be enjoyable and stress-free, and that you should learn at your own pace, with as much (or as little) homework as you want. 

I offer a comfortable, informal and fun environment where you get lots of opportunity to speak Dutch in a wide variety of situations. You will realise that making mistakes is OK, you will learn from them, get over your inhibitions and become totally at ease with the language. At last, you will no longer be afraid of speaking Dutch and you will find yourself proudly showing off your Dutch knowledge in daily life.

My greatest strengths: 
 • Breaking down the language in easy-to-follow parts and creating visual presentations and tailor-made interactive assignments that will help you retain information much better.
 • Using the latest technologies and approaches to make sure you get to learn and practise Dutch in a variety of enjoyable ways while working on all your language skills.
 • Creating every single lesson around your specific interests and needs, whether you want to focus on conversational Dutch for chatting to other parents or whether you need to prepare for the integration exam.  

Website: www.betterdutch.nl
Contact me on: info@betterdutch.nl

Expertise: Online Dutch lessons, Tailor-made Dutch lessons, Nederlandse les, NT2 les, Flipped Classroom, Preparation for the Civic Integration Exam (inburgeringsexamen), Preparation for the State Exams (NT2 examens), Dutch for beginners, Dutch for parents.
